title: What champions are the very best at freezing lane?
body: Regardless of how well they do out of lane, who (in each lane) is the best at freezing?

replies.body: Its not so much the ice but her body that leaves me frozen with my jaw dropped.

> [{quoted}](name=Matutinus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XtpHjlXr,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-13T05:43:01.923+0000)
>
> best for freezing the jungle {{champion:20}}, {{champion:113}}

I knew someone would
Sivir. Once she has a decent damage item she can solo lane just clearing wave after wave under turret.

i guess Nasus?
just farm with the q and zone out with e
Silly question, any champion can freeze a lane perfectly minus a few like Blitz cause of that ult.
Shyv goes 1 up on lane freeze and just pushes 3 waves so fast you are defeated before you can finish typing.
Do you understand what freezing a wave is?
syndra can freeze pretty well, she can use her minion toss to stop from pushing if she has to. Karthus as wel.
anyone that can tank minion agro. trundle would be pretty good in theory

anyone with an auto attack.

the problem is countering the enemy push. so it takes someone who can sustain, to tank the wave so it doesnt crash into the tower. or AOE wave clear to do the same thing but without taking damage.
ranged harass is also good for zoning out the enemy.

all ADC are fine at freezing, but its up to the support to have enough harass to prevent wave crashing. and wave stacking is dealt with with AOE spells if you have them, or just AA spam.
in mid, freezing doesnt do much, since they still get xp just fine in mid lane. if anything it opens up roaming.
at top, rene tryn and nasus are gods of freezing and massive denial. key to freezing top is self sustain.
